articles.title: Large study finds clear association between fitness and mental health - Medical News Today
articles.description: A new, robust study finds a clear link between fitness levels and mental health. The authors have reason to believe that the relationship is causal.

articles.title: One in three elderly Covid-19 patients are delirious, study finds - Daily Mail
articles.description: 817 over-65 Covid patients were admitted to hospital and became part of the US-wide study. 226 (28 per cent) were delirius, making it the sixth most common symptom.

Delirium is a common symptom of coronavirus in elderly patients, found in around one in three infected over-65s.
